function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Scarcity of local reserves in residential complexes during quarantine, leading to supply chain disruptions and increased risk of virus spread.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Household waste containing covid-19 infection due to home isolation or mild symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased amount of household waste due to global lockdowns","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Access to alternative water sources for water consumption","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown survival of covid-19 in greywater","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased pressure on energy sources during pandemics","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper segregation of medical waste","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of tap water with pathogens, chemicals, and toxins","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research and expertise on coronavirus removal from water","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of viruses and pathogens through wastewater systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient air filtration systems allowing for pathogen propagation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality due to lack of monitoring and control of pollutants","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled airflow between micro spaces leading to pathogen propagation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to outdoor spaces in buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 propagation in common building spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air filtration systems against pathogen propagation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on natural light for pathogen control","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on temperature and humidity for virus transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health due to prolonged indoor stays","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cleaning involving people can increase the spread of disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of pathogens through surfaces and high-touch areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and cleaning leading to potential disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare systems during pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable indicators and measures for pandemic resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased household energy consumption due to people spending most of their time at home during the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased household water consumption due to more frequent hand washing, laundry, and cleaning/disinfection practices during the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health risks associated with wastewater contamination and potential pathogen transmission, including from virus-infected feces.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased single-use medical waste, misunderstanding about recycling practices, and rising use of packaging during the pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Isolation and lack of resources in quarantined buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in sense of loneliness during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on literature review and expert discussion may lead to biased or incomplete understanding of pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of relevant data sources may result in incomplete information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on specific green building certification systems may limit the consideration of alternative approaches to pandemic resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indicators related to residents’ health and safety may be beyond the scope of conventional sustainability pillars, creating a potential oversight in pandemic preparedness.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for pandemic requirements in sustainable design of living spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited knowledge on how green building certification systems gbcss address pandemic requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the long-term sustainability impact of the pandemic on built environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced environmental outcomes due to waste generation and reduced recycling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid global changes and adaptation of green building rating systems due to efforts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate emphasis on interdisciplinary collaboration may result in limited progress in disease mitigation strategies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation through ai-based triage systems leading to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the use of phone-based software for patient data diagnosis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to alternative diagnostic and screening tests for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
